Welcome to Indian Cricket

The India national cricket team, also known as Team India and Men in Blue, is governed by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), and is a full member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) with Test, One Day International (ODI) and Twenty20 International (T20I) status.

Virat Kohli is the captain of Indian national team in all the three formats

Learn more

Eng vs Ind 5th Test. Live score and updates.

The fifth test between England and India will be held at The Oval. With England already winning the series, they might look at changing their squad. Whereas, India will be looking to avoid the defeat and end the tour on a high note.

Eng vs Ind 4th Test. Eng won the match and sealed the series.

The fifth test between England and India will be held at The Oval. With England already winning the series, they might look at changing their squad. Whereas, India will be looking to avoid the defeat and end the tour on a high note.

Eng vs Ind 3rd Test. Ind won and brought series to life.

India came back stronly after a huge defeat at Lord's and brought series to live. With an allround performance, India outbeat England in all three departments especially in the fielding.
